short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rewards selects the best card for the selected category. It does the tedious calculaton so you don't have to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you also struggle while making online payments? Selecting the best card taking too much of your time? Say no more. We made an extension specifically for you. Rewards selects the best card for the selected category. 
It does the tedious calculation so you don't have to.

Download Rewards now.
